title: Plat player looking to climb the ladder with a duo partner.
body:
I am a plat 5 player looking for a duo buddy to climb the ranks with and have some fun along the way as well.
Having skype/ts is a plus but not needed. 
Adc / Riven > all.
I mostly fill. 

Post rank and a bit bout yourself below : )

replies.body: I'd be happy to. Though I'm only gold 2 I can adjust my picks accordingly to yours. I'm a Kat and Rengar main however I can fill if needed. I too am looking to climb the ladder. Add me in game if you're interested: WQLFY.
